description: Three hostages were mistakenly killed in Gaza on Friday by Israeli troops in an area of intense fighting.
maintext: Meanwhile Wichian Temthong, a freed Thai hostage who was held with the three men, recalled his time with them, saying that, as they had no common language they used hand signals to communicate and give each other moral support. He was "very shocked" and "saddened" to learn of the deaths of the men he spent nearly 50 days in captivity with, he said.
title: Israel Gaza: Hostages were carrying white cloth when shot, IDF says
